rules_text:
When Escape Rocket is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a tapped Treasure token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Escape Rocket: Warpjump. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](You may reveal and cast an Interstellar card you own from outside the game.)[/i]
